description:
Go beyond the basics of web development and do something a little more experimental. Import your webcam and add interactivity.

HTML5's canvas and video tags, along with JavaScript, are the front-end developer's ticket to creative interactivity. And I can show you how to make the most of them.

In less time than it takes to watch a feature-length movie, you'll be using HTML5 video and JavaScript to import and manipulate images and video. Along the way, I points out the possibilities, from simple stuff like changing colors, to inputting video data into Three JS.
title: HTML5 and javascript in Motion For Beginner Level course
